ygData.subject: RE: Silvery Legs (spoiler request)
ygData.msgSnippet: i don t know the stats.  i ve wanted them for a while for my paladin.  they come off the froglok priest on the live side of lower guk. Shada D ukal, Level 50
ygData.messageBody:
i don't know the stats. i've wanted them for a while for my paladin. they
come off the froglok priest on the live side of lower guk.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 23 High Elf Paladin
Tyria Sarkin, Level 20 High Elf Wizard
Mithaniel Marr Server


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Greg Gillan [mailto:GGillan@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, September 21, 1999 7:32 AM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] Silvery Legs (spoiler request)
>
>
> From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>
>
> Can anyone post some more information on the Silvery legs?
> I never see any info on these, but see a lot of people wearing them.
> How do they compare to rubi? Could someone post stats,
> including weight and
> also where to obtain them?
>
>
> Elwyn Heartstring
> Level 40 Bard
> Erollisi Marr
>
